Dialogue Text: I heard that you met many more people along the way!
Sooo... what did you gather from them?
After talking to them, it seems that most of them have places related to their memories...
Just like you, they gave me relics of their own too.
That's great! Did you find any place you like?
I hope you can bring me around someday! Just like you always did.
Then that's a promise! I'll be back again, bye bye! *Fades away*
Hehe how about you make a guess the next time we meet? See ya! *Fades away*
Sure, I'll bring you around someday.
Do you have any place in particular that you like?
Ooh I guess relics are really popular here!
I hope my relic is still kept intact!
What do you mean...? Have you perhaps... forgotten me...? *Turns into sea monster*
Yay! I knew I could trust you. The next time we meet, I'll show you something new so be prepared! Bye! *Fades away*
